stories.title: How The Tables Have Turned: Analysis of Linux CVE-2022-10{15,16} in nf_tables

stories.text:
Creators of Slack

Look at all the stupid stuff people are posting on social media, there is no need to broadcast such private and personal things to the entire world. Oh wait! Let’s capitalize on this and create a software for the workplace where people will post on internal public forums, what they are working on so that they may be able to get feedback, kudos, constructive criticism, and at the same time serve as knowledge base for the entire company

Users of Slack

Hey you three, gather around here. I want to discuss this really important thing I’m doing that I’m pretty sure no one else within the company has done or would care about.
stories.title: A case for Slack (or communication platforms in general)
An elegant bamboo structure in Vietnam
Russia threatens to fine Wikipedia if it doesn't remove details about the war

stories.text:
Wife wants to write stories/blog, I want to administer a forum...both on the same subject.

I'm a backend software engineer based in networking and don't know a ton about what's out there. Initially I was planning how to write this all, but I'm assuming this is common enough that something exists, or perhaps a reverse proxy setup where www leads to something WordPressish, and forum leads to something phpbbish.

Anyone have a similar experience/recommendations?

If it matters at all, I know nothing about frontend dev or php for that matter. Mainly C/Go/Python.
stories.title: Ask HN: Forum/Blog Combo Stack

stories.text:
This thread is similar to the monthly "Who is hiring?" and "Freelancer? Seeking freelancer?" threads.

But this one is for people who don't want to work for money and are not looking for people who want to work for money. But for people who want to work together on cool projects.

For free to make the world better or to start a startup.

If you do, please post your project or your skills!

(Inspired by https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=30162767 )
stories.title: Ask HN: Who wants to collaborate? (April 2022)
